rows.label: qst300301_msg001
rows.name:
(Temp) Text for when
prerequisites are not met

rows.label: qst300301_msg0001
rows.name: You've come at a good time.

rows.label: qst300301_msg0002
rows.name:
Before, Zuo and I just had to fight
behind the old man...[ML:Dash ] but now we're
swamped with office work we're not good at.

rows.label: qst300301_msg0003
rows.name:
So we wanted to leave it to someone
good at office work, and we were
just about to hire a newcomer.

rows.label: qst300301_msg0004
rows.name:
We have three candidates, but we were
having trouble deciding who to choose
when you, the leader, showed up.

rows.label: qst300301_msg0005
rows.name:
So, I'd like you to choose
the one you think is best!

rows.label: qst300301_msg0006
rows.name:
You have a good eye for people,
right? You have great companions.

rows.label: qst300301_msg0007
rows.name:
I'll call the candidates in one by one,
so I'd like you to ask them what you want
and determine the most suitable person.

rows.label: qst300301_msg0008
rows.name:
The interview will be at
the training ground. When
you're ready, let me know.
